channel.title: Fun to mess with the gold selling business [PLUS VIDEO(S)]
channel.description:
this is what you do go on a gold selling website as...
Name: Andrew Email: Reports@Jagex.com (So that way even if they email it ... you know) Reason: Complaints and reports that this site is offering illegal gold to cheat runescape Account name (If needed): Mod Andrew G
Basically you this is how the conversation is supposed to go... (I talked with them again shortly after and they promised to stop selling gold if we do not get lawyers involved which is probably bull shit but its funny...)
anyway this is kind of how it goes this one was sort of bad but they still believed me...
I will be posting better ones more I know some of you may think this is gay but I only started this because I'm bored
http://s284.photobucket.com/albums/ll37/zykev2/?action=view&current=clip0016.flv
http://s284.photobucket.com/albums/ll37/zykev2/?action=view&current=clip0020.flv
edit: I just got another one to stop selling gold on there site -.- post the video later
w00t flame
